author: _shemnon
content: Nethermind forked off at block 17804.  This is a known failure and is expected as I'm throwing the EEST tests at the chain. A new test was added prior to the devnet launch, this is a EIP-7698 related failure. https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/1211/files#diff-eda6fa2d6c5e6be140d2bd956385690ffd64d12ae4b4085c2adf691aeb8dbdf4R258
